examplePhrases: Alexa ask the ferry timetable when's the next ferry
Alexa ask the ferry timetable when the next ferry leaves Gourock
Alexa ask the ferry timetable when is the next ferry to Kilcreggan
en-GB.name: kilcreggan-ferry
en-GB.description: This skill allows the Kilcreggan-Gourock ferry timetable to be queried from Alexa

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Ask the fery timetable whens the next ferry from gourock to kilcreggan
